code: import React from'react';import Box from'@mui/material/Box';import Typography from'@mui/material/Typography';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import{ref,set}from"firebase/database";import{database}from"../firebase-config";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ViewProduct(){var location=useLocation().state;var description=location.description,picture=location.picture,title=location.title,price=location.price;var handleAddToCart=function handleAddToCart(e){e.preventDefault();set(ref(database,'shopping/'+new Date().getTime()),{picture:picture,title:title,price:price});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',m:{xs:2,md:3,lg:5},p:{xs:1,md:3,lg:5}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{order:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{component:"img",sx:{height:400,width:400,maxHeight:{xs:350,md:400,lg:800},maxWidth:{xs:350,md:400,lg:800}},alt:"The house from the offer.",src:location.picture})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{order:2,m:7,width:"90%",maxWidth:{xs:"90%",md:"80%",lg:"50%"}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"h1",variant:"h4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mb:2},children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"h1",variant:"h6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mb:2},children:["$",price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mb:4},children:description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",onClick:function onClick(e){handleAddToCart(e);},children:"Add to Cart"})]})]});}export default ViewProduct;
